column4: anyone had any exprience with nvidia geforce 8400GS? i'm building a new computer and am gonna use that as my second graphics card for dual screen
i find that a lot more bother to set up dual screen than having 2 graphics cards
plus, my first graphics card is on my motherboard
otherboard is an intel...can't remember model number
but xmoto works fine with my 7 year old laptop with an ATI graphics card
infact, i got compiz-fusion working on this
i think my motherboard's built in graphics card only has 1 output...which is why i was getting the nvidia
2 secs i'll check the model number
you recommend something else? i've not bought it yet
this is getting a bit offtopic
what are you using to burn this
i used the built in cd burner to burn it to cd, and unetbootin to put it on the usb stick
then it is likely the media if md5 sum passes as well as the disk integrity check
but i tried cds, usb drives, and 3 different harddrives
what I meant was the media (ie cd quality, sometimes are name brand but are in fact counterfeit)
i tried 2 different brands. and my usb drives are kingston and cruzer
